description.ko: 시간과 바람의 인내심 강한 손길이 고대 석재에 새겨 넣은 지구의 촉각적 역사.
description.en: The tactile history of the earth, etched into the ancient stone by the patient hands of time and wind.

prompt: A macro cross-section of a desert canyon wall, revealing intricate erosion patterns and geological strata with veins of raw gold mineral. Rough textures of rock, sediment layers, and parched soil in deep ochre and burnt umber. 8k resolution, hyper-realistic. Lighting mimics the harsh, direct sun of high noon, creating deep dramatic shadows in the crevices. Micro-displacement textures for every grain of sand and layer of sediment, rendered with global illumination to show the narrative of time carved in stone.
